title: Alejandro (song)
summary: "Alejandro" is a song by American singer Lady Gaga. It was released as the third single from her third EP, The Fame Monster (2009). Co-written and produced by Gaga and Nadir "RedOne" Khayat, it was inspired by her "Fear of Men Monster". The singer bids farewell to her lovers over mid-tempo synth-pop music with a Europop beat.
